title: 25: Affirmative Action
itunes:author: Philosophy Talk Starters
itunes:summary:
More at http://philosophytalk.org/shows/affirmative-action.

Is affirmative action a way of balancing out inequality? Or is it just another form of bias in admissions and hiring practices? And where's the line between fostering diversity and lowering standards? John and Ken affirmatively welcome Elizabeth Anderson from the University of Michigan, author of "The Imperative of Integration."
itunes:subtitle: More at http://philosophytalk.org/shows/affirmatiâ€¦
description:
More at http://philosophytalk.org/shows/affirmative-action.

Is affirmative action a way of balancing out inequality? Or is it just another form of bias in admissions and hiring practices? And where's the line between fostering diversity and lowering standards? John and Ken affirmatively welcome Elizabeth Anderson from the University of Michigan, author of "The Imperative of Integration."
